resources.string: Try to guess whether statement is true or false. \nCorrect answer earns 10 points, wrong answer -10 points, skip -5 points. \nTry to get as may as possible in 1 minute!

This game is designed for training purpose. 
Objectives: 
 - learn NavigationUI(menu, Up button, Drawer, Navigation Graph and slide animation) 
 - learn ViewModel architecture 
 - create ViewModel using ViewModelProvider 
 - create ViewModel using ViewModelFactory 
 - implement Observer Pattern 
 - data binding between ViewModel and layout.xml 
 - implement vibrator patten
I would like to share my score of %d playing TRUE or FALSE game
